description:
We all know that positive thinking has great potential to improve our lives. But for so many of us the results of positive thinking do not live up to the promise.

Have you ever resolved to think positive or to use positive affirmations but within a few days you seem to give up, perhaps without even really noticing?

Although there are several reasons why this might happen, one of the main problems is the sabotaging effect of unconscious negative thoughts that oppose our efforts at positive thinking.

In "Real Positive Thinking" you will learn how to overcome those powerful unconscious negative thoughts so that the promise of positive thinking can be fulfilled for you too.
title: Real Positive Thinking: Free Yourself Of Negativity Forever
